https://tmrev.io/movie/140109-Dear Dracula 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vr3gfVxlHjWiO8ebsSE45Spa6hr.jpg Sam loves scary movies, especially the ones with Dracula. This year, instead of writing to Santa for Christmas, Sam writes to Dracula, telling Dracula that he wants to be a real vampire on Halloween this year. Sam is in for quite a surprise as the most famous of all vampires himself responds. Dear Dracula
